trans-unit.source: Specifies the threshold that triggers a connection-time warning that a password is about to expire. The threshold must be a DOUBLE value greater than 0.0.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the threshold that triggers a connection-time warning that a password is about to expire.
The threshold must be a DOUBLE value greater than 0.0.

target.mrk: Specifies the threshold that triggers a connection-time warning that a password is about to expire.
The threshold must be a DOUBLE value greater than 0.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid locking out the super-user, the password of the database owner of a credentials database never expires.

seg-source.mrk: To avoid locking out the super-user, the password of the database owner of a credentials database never expires.

target.mrk: To avoid locking out the super-user, the password of the database owner of a credentials database never expires.

trans-unit.source: A warning is raised when a user logs in and the remaining lifetime of that user's password is less than this proportion of the maximum password lifetime. That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> raises a warning when the remaining lifetime of a password is less than <codeph>(derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold * derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis)</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: A warning is raised when a user logs in and the remaining lifetime of that user's password is less than this proportion of the maximum password lifetime.

That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> raises a warning when the remaining lifetime of a password is less than <codeph>(derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold * derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis)</codeph>.

target.mrk: A warning is raised when a user logs in and the remaining lifetime of that user's password is less than this proportion of the maximum password lifetime.

That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> raises a warning when the remaining lifetime of a password is less than <codeph>(derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold * derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis)</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: To set the lifetime of the password, use the derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis property.

seg-source.mrk: To set the lifetime of the password, use the derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis property.

target.mrk: To set the lifetime of the password, use the derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeMillis property.

trans-unit.source: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold=0.2 -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold', '0.2');

seg-source.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold=0.2 -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold', '0.2');

target.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold=0.2 -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.native.passwordLifetimeThreshold', '0.2');

trans-unit.source: Static. For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect. For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

target.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.
